abstract: Fiat Chrysler warns owners of about five dozen 2015 sport utility vehicles to stop driving them immediately, issuing recall; cite serious issue with suspension component; announcement is made even as National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is set to hold hearing on company's failure to promptly fix safety defects in roughly 20 separate recalls.
lead_paragraph: Fiat Chrysler says about five dozen of the 2015 models require modifications and should not be driven.

headline.main: Urgent Recall for Some Jeep Grand Cherokees and Dodge Durangos
headline.print_headline: Fiat Chrysler Issues Urgent Recall on 5 Dozen Sport Utility Vehicles

snippet: Fiat Chrysler says about five dozen of the 2015 models require modifications and should not be driven.
